name: politico
text: It is unclear whether President Trump caught the coronavirus directly from Hop Hicks, who had traveled with him Tuesday for his debate against Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden in Cleveland. Here's the timeline üëá https://t.co/3Zf384tv3T

name: politico
text: Hicks showed symptoms and received her test result early Thursday, but few people in the White House knew about her diagnosis until later in the afternoon, according to the person familiar with the situation https://t.co/3Zf384tv3T

name: politico
text: Hicks was seen traveling Tuesday on Air Force One without a mask, and she accompanied the president Wednesday to his rally in Minnesota https://t.co/3Zf384tv3T

name: politico
text: Only a small group of White House officials were aware of Hicks' positive test Thursday morning, but news spread to more aides inside the West Wing later in the day https://t.co/3Zf384tv3T

name: politico
text: Business at the W.H. continued as usual. Press secretary Kayleigh McEnany held a briefing in the late morning. In the afternoon, Trump flew to his private golf club in Bedminster, N.J., for a fundraising roundtable and reception with high-dollar donors. https://t.co/3Zf384tv3T

name: politico
text: Pressed today on when he found out about Hicks testing positive ‚Äî and whether he concealed the news of her diagnosis until after Trump's fundraiser ‚Äî Meadows told reporters "we discovered that right as Marine One was taking off" https://t.co/3Zf384tv3T https://t.co/YhxcPWGvyT

name: politico
text:

name: politico
text:
Hicks showed symptoms and received her test result early Thursday, but few people in the White House knew about her diagnosis until later in the afternoon, according to a person familiar with the situation

https://t.co/3Zf384tv3T

name: politico
text:
Hicks was seen traveling Tuesday on Air Force One without a mask, and she accompanied Trump Wednesday üëá to his rally in Minnesota. Only a small group of W.H. officials were aware of her positive test Thursday morning

https://t.co/3Zf384tv3T https://t.co/YD2f9CQqE7

name: politico
text: News spread to more aides inside the West Wing later in the day, but continued as usual at the White House. Press secretary Kayleigh McEnany held a briefing in the late morning. https://t.co/3Zf384tv3T https://t.co/K1w3tfOHFq

name: politico
text: In the afternoon, Trump flew to his private golf club in Bedminster, N.J., for a fundraising roundtable and reception with high-dollar donors. name: politico
text:

name: politico
